content:
marker (Width,Height) popupMarker_image Set the state images of the popupMarker (see directButton: image) popupMarker_scale Set the scale of the popupMarker scale=x or scale=(x,y,z) popupMarker_pos Set the position of the popupMarker relative to the parent
optionMenu pos=(x,y,z) popupMarker_relief Set the relief value of the popupMarker, the depth of the beveled
edge relief=x (for int value) or relief=None (for no relief)
